Name: Villa Nieuwmarkt
Review Text: Good location, with beautiful view. The coffee was ok and I had a good time

Name: Villa Nieuwmarkt
Review Text: The place was cozy and in a wonderful place in Amsterdam, and there was a cat. The staff serving was also very kind. That were the good things about it. My boyfriend and I went to get some nachos. The guacamole seemed canned and expired, it ‚Ä¶

Name: Villa Nieuwmarkt
Review Text: Food was okay although the waitress dropped half a hot cheesy toastie on my leg and didn't apologise just went and got another one.

Name: Villa Nieuwmarkt
Review Text: Very cosy place. Ride in front of the train station. They have a very good drinks and beer. Their caffee late is very delicious.

Name: Villa Nieuwmarkt
Review Text: Nice place! Lovely views from the heated terrace outside. Food was yummy, beer was good & the staff were friendly!

Name: Villa Nieuwmarkt
Review Text: Nice vibes. Good beer choice as for NL. AND RESPECT THE CAT IN THE BAR! It is my homie.

Name: Villa Nieuwmarkt
Review Text: Strongly recommended. They have been super nice  flexible and kind. Especially during this time of pandemic good service kindness will never go unnoticed.Good food we ordered chicken sates and Freitjes and croquet which was a special request, greatly appreciated. THANK YOU!!

Name: Villa Nieuwmarkt
Review Text: Nice cozy pub. The food is decent and not expensive, but the atmosphere is great either alone or with friends. There is a house cat that gets all the attention...

Name: Villa Nieuwmarkt
Review Text:
Great place with amazing service, reasonable prices, and free wifi!
Heated outdoor seating.

Name: Villa Nieuwmarkt
Review Text: Easy and convenient place to stop for a drink and bite when in this area.

Name: Villa Nieuwmarkt
Review Text: Very bad pizza. Like ready made and bought from a supermarket....

Name: Villa Nieuwmarkt
Review Text: Amazing service, the food incredible, and a lovely place. Prices accordingly. A "must visit".

Name: Villa Nieuwmarkt
Review Text: Lovely place, yummy food

Name: Villa Nieuwmarkt
Review Text: Great food and service, cozy place with tables outside, viewing Nieuwmarkt

Name: Villa Nieuwmarkt
Review Text: The Romanian waiter was very welcoming and friendly, thoughtful and attentive, provided blankets and a great seating arrangement for us, highly appreciated. The place is very nice and with great view of the entire square.

Name: Villa Nieuwmarkt
Review Text: Went for lunch. Food was good and a large portion. I had the Satay Chicken which is a Dutch specialty. Price was fair too. Only down side is that it was empty with no atmosphere. Would try it again if I was out that way. It is in the middle of nowhere so not many other options in this area so give it a go.

Name: Villa Nieuwmarkt
Review Text: Great food, decent price. Bathrooms were very dirty however. That was the only downside. The waiters were very nice although a few of them seemed like it was there first day. Some waiters didn‚Äôt speak any Dutch, which annoyed some other customers.

Name: Villa Nieuwmarkt
Review Text: Decent small bar with a decent selection of draught beers. We stopped in for a pint and we liked it. It's not over priced given it's proximity to its surroundings. I'd recommend it for sure if you just want a beer while perusing the neighborhood. üòâ

Name: Villa Nieuwmarkt
Review Text: Price ok for central Amsterdam, but the blonde waiter with ponytail on top of head is very irritated and makes sarcastic/rude comments after customers leave the bar area. We were sitting by the bar so we heard it all. The other restaurants had wonderful wait staff. Would not suggest visiting. There are better places around town!

Name: Villa Nieuwmarkt
Review Text:
Had a lovely Angus steak. Perfect cuisson, very nice presentation and price was not cheap but correct given the quality.
Atmosphere is very authentic as well, lovely. ‚Ä¶

Name: Villa Nieuwmarkt
Review Text: Found by accident after walking by De Waag we found this small but cozy place. The guy that received us, a very sympathetic Czech fella who speaks 8 or 9 idioms made our waiting here much more happy. Simple meals and affordable prices.

Name: Villa Nieuwmarkt
Review Text: I enjoyed The food very much, prices are reasonable!

Name: Villa Nieuwmarkt
